pages.text: $(bold)Extended Reach$() increases the distance at which you can $(important)break blocks and attack entities$()!$(br2)Feel like you have longer arms!

pages.title: Reach Distance
pages.text: $(li)Normal reach: ~4.5 blocks$(li)Level 1: +1 block reach$(li)Level 2: +2 blocks reach$(li)Level 4: +4 blocks reach!$(br2)Mine, place, and fight from much farther away!

pages.text: $(li)Mine dangerous blocks safely$(li)Attack from greater distance$(li)Place blocks farther away$(li)Build more easily$(li)PvP advantage$(li)Harvest crops without moving$(br2)$(o)Become Mr. Fantastic!$()
